name: Bridge Troll
content:
The Bridge Troll was a male gurk that lived on the planet Lok during the Galactic Civil War. The beast was trained by the Sulfur Lake Pirates to guard their hideout after the Battle of Yavin. In 1 ABY, the Lok Revenants, enemies of the Sulfur Lake Pirates, raided the Sulfur Lake Pirate Hideout in order to retrieve the memory module of an Imperial droid. During the assault, a spacer working for an underling of Nym's named Mako Ghast attacked and killed the Bridge Troll.
The Bridge Troll appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. The Bridge Troll was added to the game as part of the revamped "Nym's Theme Park," released with the "Game Update 16," on March 23, 2010.
